data.title: ★ Christian Berkel Address
data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to Christian Berkel
data.text:
Fan mail address:

Christian Berkel

Schlag Künstleragentur

Joseph Haydn Str. 1

10557 Berlin

Germany

Not an updated address?

Please let us know! Address information:

Schlag Künstleragentur

(Talent Agency)

Joseph Haydn Str. 1

10557 Berlin

Germany

Phone: +49 (0)30.327793-4

Fax: +49 (0)30.327793-55

Official website

Note: View larger map

If you want to request an autograph, follow the guidelines bellow. If you just want to mail a letter with the address above, and do not want anything back, then you can stop reading! If you live in Germany send a properly stamped and self addressed envelope (minimum size 8.5" x 4") with your request letter and a photo. You can include a piece of cardboard to keep the photo from bending in shipping and also add "Do Not Bend" on the envelopes. Send your letter and wait. On average, there is going to be a 3+ month wait for a response. If you do not live in Germany, add several* International Reply Coupons. The International Reply Coupons (IRC) will be used by the receiver to purchase german stamps. You can only get them at your post office. Place the IRCs into the envelope, not on it. For more information on reply coupons click here. *For information on postage prices to receive a letter from Germany click here.
